messages.messageBody:
[this is long - over an hour, and has to do with the Raising Creative Kids initiative. I didn't listen to the whole thing but the speaker is apparantly a grown unschooler ---Mer]

"Any people that would give up liberty for a little temporary safety deserves
neither liberty nor safety." Benjamin Franklin


Art is why I get up in the morning, but my definition ends there. It doesn't
seem fair that I'm living for something I can't even define" ANI DIFRANCO

Grown men may learn from very little children for the hearts of little children
are pure. Therefore, the Great Spirit may show to them many things which older
people miss.

-Black Elk
